text: sadoneun geuui junim-eulobuteo geuege naelyeojin geos-eul mid-eumyeo midneun jadeuldo geuleohadoda. moduneun hananimgwa geubun-ui cheonsadeulgwa geubun-ui seongseodeulgwa geubun-ui sadodeul-eul middeola : (geudeul-i malhagil) ‘ulineun geubun-ui sadodeul jung eotteon nugudo gubunhaji anhseubnida’. ttohan geudeul-i malhagil “ulineun deul-eossgo bogjonghayeossseubnida. jeohuiui junim, dangsin-ui yongseoleul guhabnida. gwichaghal gos-eun dangsin-isibnida”
